pkgmetadata.longdescription: Rmetrics - Modelling Extreme Events in Finance // Provides functions for analysing and modelling extreme events in financial time Series. The topics include: (i) data pre- processing, (ii) explorative data analysis, (iii) peak over threshold modelling, (iv) block maxima modelling, (v) estimation of VaR and CVaR, and (vi) the computation of the extreme index.
